full_summary:
===============

# High Density Trellis Orchard Installation for the Canadian Clonal Genebank

** Tender Reference Number **: CB-378-7481006
** Amendment Number **: 7
** Solicitation Number **: 01B46-2023-096

## Notice Overview

The Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) invites qualified suppliers to participate in a tender for the installation of two high-density orchard plots at the Canadian Clonal Genebank (CCGB) fields in Harrow, Ontario.

## Tender Description

The aim of this tender is to install two high-density orchard plots on a total area of three acres. The installations will take place in two separate locations: Field T3 Affleck Farm and Field 50C on the Main Farm.

## Key Requirements

* Installation of two high-density orchard plots with a total area of three acres
* Orchards to be located in Field T3 Affleck Farm and Field 50C on the Main Farm
* Installation to be completed in a single project

## Site Visit

A site visit is highly recommended to familiarize bidders with the work site and expected installation requirements. The site visit will be held at the Harrow Research and Development Centre on November 7, 2023, at 9h00 AM local time.

## Tender Timeline

* **Publication Date**: October 31, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 20, 2023, 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None

## Additional Information

* Trade Agreements: North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Region of Opportunity: World
* Region of Delivery: Ontario (except National Capital Region)
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Jean-François Lemay
	+ Email: jean-francois.lemay@agr.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (343) 571-9706

## Tender Documents

The tender documents and additional information can be accessed at: 
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23563/addendum-1-2023-096_0.pdf
